key.name: start-on-login
key.description: Start Ring on login. Only supported on XDG compliant desktop environments.

key.name: hide-on-close
key.summary: Hide on close instead of quitting.
key.description: Hide the main window on close instead of quitting the application. If set to true, Ring will continue to run and be able to receive calls and messages if the main window is closed.

key.name: bring-window-to-front
key.summary: Bring window to foreground on incoming calls.
key.description: Bring window to foreground on incoming calls.

key.name: window-state-hidden
key.summary: Saves whether or not the main window is currently hidden or not.
key.description: This is used when launching the application with the '--restore-last-window-state' option, which will launch the application with the main window in the same state as when it was last quit.
